arts.ttl: Tim Weah’s forced metamorphosis at Juventus
arts.sum: Now, despite the irony of finding more regular minutes as a right-back under Motta, Weah is enjoying his best individual season yet: five goals and five assists across 27 appearances in all competitions so far. While he had previously enjoyed regular playing time, this run marks the first time he has completed the full 90 minutes in five straight games during the 2024-25 season.

arts.ttl: Francisco Conceicao helps Juventus to Derby d’Italia victory over Inter Milan
arts.sum: The reigning champions were unable to take advantage of Napoli’s draw on Saturday.

arts.ttl: Juventus peg back title-chasing Inter in big win
arts.sum: Inter Milan missed the chance to go top of Serie A as they fell to a 1-0 loss at Juventus on Sunday with Francisco Conceicao scoring the decisive late goal in an action-packed match.

arts.ttl: European football: Inter miss chance while racist chants halt La Liga game
arts.sum: Inter lose 1-0 at Juventus to a Francisco Conceição goal Referee stops match at Espanyol after player complaints Inter missed the chance to go top of Serie A as they lost 1-0 at Juventus on Sunday with Francisco Conceição scoring the decisive late goal in an action packed match. The Portuguese winger sparked jubilation in the stadium after 74 minutes following some clever footwork in the box by Randal Kolo Muani before he found Conceição, who fired home. Continue reading...
